Risk factors for HIV, 
hepatitis B, or hepatitis C:
• having sex with someone 
who is infected without 
using a condom;
• injectable or snorting drugs 
and sharing equipment with 
an infected person.
• being born in or spent your 
childhood in a country 
where the infections are
